text:
Hi all
So i have a  customer who each month sends billings to his customers (not through HubSpot payment) that contain a Fixed monthly Fee + Number of seats * XX EUR, which varies from month to month (=subscrition based).
So the monthly Payment is changed from month to Month.
How can we set it up via API?
Is the only way to create a new deal each month + New Line Items for each month ?

Hi. Did you look into the: Monthly recurring revenue (MRR), not sure if that would be a solution for your case?
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-deals/HubSpots-default-deal-properties#:~:text=Monthly%20recurring%20revenue%20(MRR)%3A,value%20in%20the%20Amount%20property>.
+
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/deals/track-recurring-revenue-with-revenue-analytics>

HI <@U032NEEBG3Y>,
as per your description i am not sure whether this link will fulfill your result or not but you can check this and will notify me for any help.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#crm-object>
Hi Hardik, I have already used this method but I need a whole list of contacts it is showing a single single contact.
ok, so i think you can try this one. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#crm-objects>
which will give you an all contacts
Yes, Showing its all information like this <https://prnt.sc/5SPD2W6_NclH>
How I can get a single single from an object in the table?

<@U032NEEBG3Y>,
us can try this syntax
```{% for contact in objects.results %}
      <tr>
        <td>{{ contact.id }}</td>
        <td>{{ contact.firstname }}</td>
        <td>{{ contact.lastname }}</td>
      </tr>
    {% endfor %}```
Yes, Thank You for your help :slightly_smiling_face:
